name: AVONDALE SPRINGS AT WALLINGFORD CONDOMINIUM ASSOCIATION, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION & Howard Yerusalim, Secretary of Transportation, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Avondale Springs at Wallingford Condominium Ass'n v. Commonwealth

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.

Mr. Justice MONTEMURO is sitting by designation as Senior Justice pursuant to Judicial Assignment Docket No. 94 R1800, due to the unavailability of Mr. Justice LARSEN, see No. 127 Judicial Administration Docket No. 1, filed October 28, 1993.
parties: AVONDALE SPRINGS AT WALLINGFORD CONDOMINIUM ASSOCIATION, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION & Howard Yerusalim, Secretary of Transportation, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
Mr. Justice MONTEMURO is sitting by designation as Senior Justice pursuant to Judicial Assignment Docket No. 94 R1800, due to the unavailability of Mr. Justice LARSEN, see No. 127 Judicial Administration Docket No. 1, filed October 28, 1993.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: David T. Bolger, Paul A. Logan, King of Prusia, for A.S. at W.C.A.
Robert J. Shea, John L. Heaton, Steven Roth, John M. Hrubovcak, Harrisburg, for PENNDOT.
casebody.head_matter:
640 A.2d 412
AVONDALE SPRINGS AT WALLINGFORD CONDOMINIUM ASSOCIATION, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION & Howard Yerusalim, Secretary of Transportation, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 7, 1994.
Decided April 22, 1994.
David T. Bolger, Paul A. Logan, King of Prusia, for A.S. at W.C.A.
Robert J. Shea, John L. Heaton, Steven Roth, John M. Hrubovcak, Harrisburg, for PENNDOT.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
